Class AliasedTemplateClassResolver

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.core.TemplateClassResolver

    public class AliasedTemplateClassResolver
extends freemarker.core.OptInTemplateClassResolver
    Template class resolver that allows class name aliases.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
